name: Brothers (Sokumi)
description:
Brothers

Run through the house with your brother and try to not hit furnitures.

which one of you will be the best.

Brothers is a multiplayer game for 2 players.

Control Player 1: Z,Q,S,D and CtrlR

Control Player 2: I,J,K,L and CtrlL

Credits

Programming : Marie Elisabelar, Martin Daigle, Nathan Giraldeau, Samuel Terras-Viola

Art : Thibault Prin, Sophie Myx

Music : Bobby DeBlois

Brothers has been made during Global Game Jam 2019
